function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exclusion of less wealthy population due to internet access bias","Impact":"Underrepresentation of less wealthy individuals in the study, leading to skewed data and inaccurate conclusions","Mitigation":"Provide alternative methods of data collection, such as in-person surveys or phone interviews, to reach a more diverse population","Technologies":"None specified","People":"Less wealthy population","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Exclusion of elderly population due to digital divide","Impact":"Underrepresentation of elderly individuals in the study, leading to incomplete understanding of age-related impacts","Mitigation":"Implement in-person data collection methods and provide support for digital literacy among elderly participants","Technologies":"In-person surveys, digital literacy programs","People":"Elderly population","Owner":"Research team"},{"Description":"Reliance on self-reported and brief web-based surveys","Impact":"Risk of biased or incomplete responses, leading to unreliable data and conclusions","Mitigation":"Combine web-based surveys with in-person interviews for validation and completeness of data","Technologies":"Data validation tools, in-person interview techniques","People":"Research participants","Owner":"Research team"}]}
